div.p: Georg, Count of Württemberg and Mömpelgard (Montbéliard) etc.

Our greetings to you first, well-learned, dear special one, although we are inclined by grace to send you some special news, we have nothing else at this time than what is contained in the enclosed note. If you have any knowledge or experience, you may write to us about the same without delay. We are inclined to recognize you with grace. Be entrusted to God the Almighty.
Dated Basel, the 24th of April, in the year etc. 49. G[eorg] C[ount] o[f] Württemberg etc.
To the well-learned, our dear special Heinrich Bullinger, preacher in Zürich.
